content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron plate smelting at position(4.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0)

### Iron chest at position (4.5, -58.5)
Consists of:
- Iron chest at position (4.5, -58.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available in sufficient quantities before attempting to craft an item. In particular, iron-plate needs to be smelted in a furnace before crafting iron-chests.
- Check the furnace status to ensure it has fuel and is actively smelting iron ore into iron plates.

## NAMESPACE

### Functions:
None

### Variables:
None
